path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Falcons Inu Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_info.project_path: Experiments/contracts/Falcons Inu Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/RazzorSec-Contracts

findings.title: Use Ownable2Step instead of Ownable
findings.description: It is recommended to use Ownable2Step instead of Ownable.

findings.title: Avoid function overloading via methods
findings.description: Function overloading can lead to unintended behavior and security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Missing check for token minting/approval cap
findings.description: The FalconsInu token does not have a check to prevent exceeding the supply cap when minting tokens.
